Package com.github.huksley.app.system

System classes related to startup, security and configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SecurityAuthenticator
    Authentication interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CrudControllerBase<T extends BaseEntity>
    Simple CRUD API base for REST API
    MDC
    Utility class for mapped diagnostic context logging.
    MDC.MDCInstance
    Created on first invocation of every MDC.* method.
    SecurityAuthenticatorDatabase
    Authentication via db
    SecurityAuthenticatorTest
    Test auth (single user with USER and ADMIN role)
    SecurityConfigurer
    Setup security and JWT auth.
    SecurityConfigurer.AuthDetailsBeanPostProcessor
    Provides request in auth details https://docs.spring.io/spring-security/site/faq/faq.html#faq-request-details-in-user-service
    SecurityConfigurer.ExtendedWebAuthenticationDetails
    Provides HttpServletRequest instance as Authentication.getDetails()
    SecurityConfigurer.TokenAuthentication
    Token based authentication.
    SecurityEndpointController
    Single entry security endpoint.
    SecurityLoginProvider
    Spring Security handler which delegates to SecurityAuthenticator implementation.
    SwaggerConfig
    Configures and properly proxies Swagger UI and Swagger JSON.
    WebPageForward
    Appropriate forwarding and processing inside system.

Package com.github.huksley.app.system Description

System classes related to startup, security and configuration.
